other_title: Mahjong Legend Akagi: The Genius Who Descended Into the Darkness
闘牌伝説アカギ 闇に舞い降りた天才 (Japanese)
plot: One stormy night, Nangou is playing a game of Mahjong with the local yakuza. Soon he finds himself on a losing streak where if he loses, he'll will have to pay with his life. Suddenly, a young teenaged boy named Akagi Shigeru barges in, drenched from the rain. After watching a couple of games, he offers to replace the struggling Nangou. At that moment, a new legend was born.
